Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Razor Claw gets scrunched into Optimus Primes cab section. Fealing somewhat=
 claustrophobic he puts his foot through the windshield trying to escape. 
=

(I don't know if you've ever been inside the cab of a truck but theres not=
 much room for an average height human let alone a raptor so the damage is =
logical.)

"I am not fooled easily." Razor Claw calls out furiously, "I hav=
e been educated on the legacy of Prime and you cannot be him."
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Monday, February 05, 2001 12:58 PM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else=



  ::Optimus Prime::
   
      He grabbed the tail and picked up the rapt=
or. "You will listen to me. Do you even know who I am? I am Optimus Prime, =
the leader of the Autobots, the holder of the Matrix of Leadership."
      =
He transformed to truck mode, Razor Claw falling inside the cab section. "F=
ollow me."
      He took off once again towards the CF.
   
  (He was holdi=
ng him during transformation.)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: =
CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 05, =
2001 6:07 PM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    Razor Claw rel=
eased his sword glaring at Optimus Prime and Eclipse. He transformed to Rap=
tor to even the odds if necessary. "You ran from a battle while other Maxim=
als risked both spark and limb to protect it." The angry Raptor wan't in hi=
s right mind, he was suffering an imbalance brought on by Veratis' virus. H=
is thoughts were one sided and could only see his form of reason. 

    He =
was the mighty raptor and these four were no more than lowly prey to be con=
sumed. it didn't matter if he believed thier story. The desertion was merel=
y an excuse to lash out and look tough. Lash out he did swinging his powerf=
ul tail at Optimus, slashin a claw from his left foot at Eclipse and snappi=
ng his jaws at Wolveritron.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From:=
 dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, February 0=
5, 2001 8:19 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      ::Optim=
us Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
       
          Optimus Prime reache=
d out and grabbed the sword, just holding it there.
          "There will b=
e no bloodshed today," Prime said. "Whatever these bots did, I'm sure they =
have their reasons. Please allow them to explain."
          Eclipse looked=
 at the bot and shifted to his most powerful form, the Werewolf. "We left t=
he Cybertronian Fire because our work will not benifit if I am destroyed. T=
he Alliance was coming dangeroudly close to destroying the CF. I had to get=
 out. I am now returning to the CF, with Optimus Prime, here."
        ----=
- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 11:51 AM
        Subje=
ct: Re: Dachande respond or else


        Razor Claw stood unmoving, stari=
ng Wolveritron down.

        "You don't fight back?" he glared at the dese=
rter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

        "You do not fight then you admit your =
guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a backslashing motion at a level =
to decapitate Wolveritron.


          ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent:=
 Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:31 PM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respon=
d or else


          Razor Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. =
"Stay out of this, you are not part of the accused or a viable witness so y=
ou have no say in what happens to these deserters."

          The mutant w=
asn't exactly what bots would consider sane. he was injected with a virus t=
o stabilize his double transformation but was only given one sequence to ke=
y upon. Maybe it was the virus, maybe it was his injuries, or maybe the for=
mer Pred was just sickened by bots who'd run from a battle and leave thier =
comrades to suffer the pains of battle.

          "Now for business I was =
dealing with you!" he reached out and poked Wolveritron in the chestplate t=
rying to pursue his issues.


            ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
         From: dachande 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          =
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 1:57 PM
            Subject: Re: Dachan=
de respond or else


            ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus:=
:
             
                They had not heard Razor Claw ask them to s=
top, but they heard him the second time. Prime was walking away, but he sto=
pped and came back.
                "Is there something you need from us?" =
Prime asked.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent:=
 Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
              Subject: Re: Dachande r=
espond or else


              It all started back when...


              =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: dachande 
          =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Monday, December 18, 20=
00 7:40 PM
                Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


     =
           ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
                 
                =
    They had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no par=
t in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leav=
ing, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away
=

                So I responded with...
                . 
                =
Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook t=
hem for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice =
and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of=
 the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted t=
hem. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

              =
  Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally Optimus P=
rime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to recognise him) Wolverit=
ron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. and Razor Claw caught up wit=
h them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it was those three that wer=
e in the same cave as Vuloise.)

                He aproached the three bot=
s ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully







=





          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
                
                www.=
